games.title: Fun Games
games.subtitle: Enjoy these fun and educational games designed for children and families.

ticTacToe.title: Tic Tac Toe
ticTacToe.description: Classic strategy game for two players

snake.title: Snake Game
snake.description: Guide the snake to eat food and grow longer

rockPaperScissors.title: Rock Paper Scissors
rockPaperScissors.description: Choose your weapon and battle the computer!

hangman.title: Hangman
hangman.description: Guess the word before the drawing is complete!

memory.title: Memory Game
memory.description: Match all the pairs of cards to win!
memory.clickToFlip: Click on cards to flip them and find matching pairs. Try to complete the game in as few moves as possible!
memory.gameCompleted: You completed the game in {moves} moves!
